languages.text: {n}Злой смех Ульфара гремит под сводами логова.{/n} "Ловкий юкко, а! А ведь ты мог сдаться без боя, и тогда я бы без мучений свернул тебе шею. Но ты сам выбрал умереть побольнее..."

{n}Ulfar's rumbling malicious laughter echoes off the lair's ceiling.{/n} "A nimble pest, aren't you? You could have surrendered without a fight — I would have snapped your neck and spared you torment. But you chose to die more painfully..."
languages.original_text: {n}Злой смех Ульфара гремит под сводами логова.{/n} "Ловкий юкко, а! А ведь ты мог сдаться без боя, и тогда я бы без мучений свернул тебе шею. Но ты сам выбрал умереть побольнее..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling malicious laughter echoes off the lair's ceiling.{/n} "A nimble jukko, aren't you? You could have surrendered without a fight — I would have snapped your neck and spared you torment. But you chose to die more painfully..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling malicious laughter echoes off the lair's ceiling.{/n} "A nimble pest, aren't you? You could have surrendered without a fight — I would have snapped your neck and spared you torment. But you chose to die more painfully..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}乌尔法恶毒的笑声在空旷的巢穴中隆隆作响。{/n}“你可真是只身手敏捷的小虫子，对不对？你本可以乖乖束手就擒，让我直接拧断脖子，省去许多痛苦，可你却偏要惨死在我手上……”
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling malicious laughter echoes off the lair's ceiling.{/n} "A nimble pest, aren't you? You could have surrendered without a fight — I would have snapped your neck and spared you torment. But you chose to die more painfully..."

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法恶毒的笑声在空旷的巢穴中隆隆作响。{/n}“你可真是只身手敏捷的小虫子，对不对？你本可以乖乖束手就擒，让我直接拧断脖子，省去许多痛苦，可你却偏要惨死在我手上……”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}La estentórea y maliciosa carcajada de Ulfar resuena por el techo de la guarida.{/n} «Eres un gusano muy ágil, ¿verdad? Podrías haberte rendido sin presentar batalla: te habría partido el cuello para ahorrarte sufrimiento. Pero has elegido morir dolorosamente...».
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling malicious laughter echoes off the lair's ceiling.{/n} "A nimble pest, aren't you? You could have surrendered without a fight — I would have snapped your neck and spared you torment. But you chose to die more painfully..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La estentórea y maliciosa carcajada de Ulfar resuena por el techo de la guarida.{/n} «Eres un jukko muy ágil, ¿verdad? Podrías haberte rendido sin presentar batalla: te habría partido el cuello para ahorrarte sufrimiento. Pero has elegido morir dolorosamente...».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le rire malveillant d'Ulfar résonne dans la pièce.{/n} « En voilà une vermine bien vive. Vous savez, vous auriez pu vous rendre sans combattre. Je vous aurais brisé la nuque d'un coup sec et évité tous ces tourments. Mais vous avez choisi de souffrir... »
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling malicious laughter echoes off the lair's ceiling.{/n} "A nimble pest, aren't you? You could have surrendered without a fight — I would have snapped your neck and spared you torment. But you chose to die more painfully..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire malveillant d'Ulfar résonne dans la pièce.{/n} « En voilà un sacré jukko, vous êtes bien vif. Vous savez, vous auriez pu vous rendre sans combattre. Je vous aurais brisé la nuque d'un coup sec et évité tous ces tourments. Mais vous avez choisi de souffrir... »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfars Grollen und boshaftes Lachen hallt von der Decke des Verstecks wider.{/n} "Auch Ungeziefer kann flink sein. Ihr hättet Euch auch kampflos ergeben können – dann hätte ich Euch das Genick gebrochen und Euch Eure Qualen erspart. Ihr habt Euch allerdings entschieden, einen schmerzhafteren Tod zu erleiden ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling malicious laughter echoes off the lair's ceiling.{/n} "A nimble pest, aren't you? You could have surrendered without a fight — I would have snapped your neck and spared you torment. But you chose to die more painfully..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfars Grollen und boshaftes Lachen hallt von der Decke des Verstecks wider.{/n} "Auch Ungeziefer kann flink sein. Ihr hättet Euch auch kampflos ergeben können – dann hätte ich Euch das Genick gebrochen und Euch Eure Qualen erspart. Ihr habt Euch allerdings entschieden, einen schmerzhafteren Tod zu erleiden ..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}ウルファーの悪意に満ちた笑い声が、隠れ家の天井にこだまする。{/n}「すばしっこい害虫だな？戦わずに降伏することだってできたろうが…それなら、首をへし折って苦しまずに殺してやったものを。だが、お前は苦痛に満ちた死を選んだ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling malicious laughter echoes off the lair's ceiling.{/n} "A nimble pest, aren't you? You could have surrendered without a fight — I would have snapped your neck and spared you torment. But you chose to die more painfully..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ウルファーの悪意に満ちた笑い声が、隠れ家の天井にこだまする。{/n}「すばしっこい野郎だな？戦わずに降伏することだってできたろうが…それなら、首をへし折って苦しまずに殺してやったものを。だが、お前は苦痛に満ちた死を選んだ…」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ulfar'ın gümbürdeyen hain kahkahası, inin tavanında yankılanıyor.{/n} "Açıkgöz musibetin tekisin sen, değil mi? Savaşmadan teslim olabilirdin. Boynunu kırıverip seni eziyetten kurtarırdım. Ancak sen, acılar içinde ölmeyi seçtin..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ulfar's rumbling malicious laughter echoes off the lair's ceiling.{/n} "A nimble pest, aren't you? You could have surrendered without a fight — I would have snapped your neck and spared you torment. But you chose to die more painfully..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar'ın gümbürdeyen hain kahkahası, inin tavanında yankılanıyor.{/n} "Açıkgöz musibetin tekisin sen, değil mi? Savaşmadan teslim olabilirdin. Boynunu kırıverip seni eziyetten kurtarırdım. Ancak sen, acılar içinde ölmeyi seçtin..."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
